1: <pb/><t>Ajawaxel,</t> <t>¿jachin ta</t> <t>ri cäcuinic cac'oji'</t> <t>pa ri achoch la?</t> <t>¿Jachin ta ri cäcuinic cäjeki'</t> <t>pa ri tastalicalaj juyub la?</t>
2: <t>Xuwi ri man c'o ta mac</t> <t>pa ri u c'aslemal</t> <t>xukuje' cuban utzil,</t> <t>ri cubij ri kastzij</t> <t>ruc' ronojel ranima',</t>
3: <t>ri man c'o ta jun rajil</t> <t>u tz'akat cuyok'o,</t> <t>ri man cuban ta c'ax che ri rachil,</t> <t>mawi cäretzelaj u wäch ri u c'ulja;</t>
4: <t>ri cäretzelaj u wäch</t> <t>ri takal retzelaxic u wäch,</t> <t>nim c'u caril wi</t> <t>ri cuya' u k'ij ri Ajawaxel;</t> <t>ri quebutz'akatisaj ri e u chi'm</t> <t>pune' c'ax quelic;</t>
5: <t>ri cuya' u rajil pa jalomal</t> <t>ri man cutok'ij ta kajebal rech,</t> <t>ri man cuc'am ta u pa k'abaj</t> <t>che u banic c'ax</t> <t>che ri man c'o ta u mac.</t> <t>Ri je u c'aslemal wa'</t> <t>mawi jumul catzak ta na.</t>
